source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_SEQ_00<tab>Wichard has a suggestion for his uncle.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_SEQ_00<tab>ラールガーズリーチのウィチャードは、冒険者に頼みたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_SEQ_01<tab>Speaking with Wichard you learn that he is Gundobald's nephew. The passionate Ala Mhigan lad wishes to contact his uncle and ask for his help in rebuilding their once-great nation. However, as he is too busy to make the journey himself, he asks you to deliver a letter to Gundobald in his place.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_SEQ_01<tab>ウィチャードと話した。どうやら彼は、グンドバルドの甥だそうで、アラミゴが解放された今、連絡を取りたいのだそうだ。リトルアラミゴの「グンドバルド」に、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D4001 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_SEQ_02<tab>Gundobald is surprised to learn you have brought tidings from his estranged nephew. While he appreciates Wichard's invitation, he explains he has no choice but to decline it and look after those who are unable to leave Little Ala Mhigo. You are asked instead to check if Wichard would be willing to accept those from Little Ala Mhigo that wish to return to their homeland.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_SEQ_02<tab>グンドバルドに、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D4001 /var>を渡した。手紙には、アラミゴで共に暮らそうとの旨が書いてあったようだが、リトルアラミゴにいる者を見捨てられないため、この申し出を断るというグンドバルド。逆に彼から、アラミゴへの帰還志願者たちの面倒を見てくれないか、ウィチャードに、尋ねてほしいと頼まれた。ラールガーズリーチの「ウィチャード」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_SEQ_03<tab>Wichard is saddened to hear he has been refused by his uncle, but enthusiastically agrees to accept anyone that wishes to leave Little Ala Mhigo and join him. He sets about preparing for the group's arrival and bids you tell Gundobald the good news.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_SEQ_03<tab>ウィチャードに報告した。移住希望者の面倒を快く引き受けてくれた。リトルアラミゴの「グンドバルド」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_SEQ_04<tab>Gundobald is glad to hear his request has been accepted. While some in Little Ala Mhigo are yet to make up their minds, there is a group that is already prepared to make the move to their homeland. Gundobald asks that you speak with him once more should you be willing to aid this group during their travels.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_SEQ_04<tab>グンドバルドに報告した。帰還志願者の第一陣について、移送の手伝いを引き受けてくれるなら声をかけてほしいと語るグンドバルドなのであった。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_TODO_00<tab>Deliver Wichard's letter to Gundobald in Little Ala Mhigo.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_TODO_00<tab>リトルアラミゴのグンドバルドに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8D4001 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_TODO_01<tab>Report to Wichard in Rhalgr's Reach.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_TODO_01<tab>ラールガーズリーチのウィチャードに報告

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_TODO_02<tab>Report to Gundobald in Little Ala Mhigo.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_TODO_02<tab>リトルアラミゴのグンドバルドに報告

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_000<tab>Have you ever visited Little Ala Mhigo in Thanalan? If you have, there is something I would ask of you.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_000もしや、あなたは外から来た冒険者では？
ザナラーンにある、リトルアラミゴという場所を知っていたら、
少し頼みたいことがあるのですが、ご存知でしょうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_001<tab>My uncle, a man named Gundobald, lives there.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_001行かれたことがあるとは、それなら話が早い！
そこに私の叔父にあたるグンドバルドという人物が、
いるはずなのですが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_002<tab>Now Ala Mhigo has been freed I had been hoping to contact him. However, there is still much work to be done and I am unable to leave my post.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_002アラミゴが解放された今こそ、
どうにかして、連絡を取りたいと考えているのです。
ただ、戦後処理に人手が必要な今、私自身はここを離れられず……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_003<tab>Instead I have written him a letter which I would like you to deliver to my uncle if possible.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_003そこで、手紙に用件をしたためたので、
これを「グンドバルド」叔父さんに届けていただきたいのです。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_004<tab>We will all need to work together if we are to restore Ala Mhigo to its former glory. I would very much like to have my uncle by my side for this.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_004これからアラミゴは、復興に向けて、
長い道のりを歩むことになるでしょう。
そこで、共にアラミゴで暮らせたら、と思っていましてね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_005<tab>I know I am asking a lot of you, but there is no one else I can trust with this.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_005小間使いのようなことをさせてしまって、
心苦しいのですが、よろしくお願いいたします。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_006<tab>Please deliver the letter I gave you to Gundobald.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_006お渡しした手紙を、
「グンドバルド」叔父さんに届けていただけますか？
よろしくお願いいたしますね。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_010<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─hero of the Resistance! Do you have business with me?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_010冒険者よ……いや、アラミゴを救った「解放者」よ！
私に何か用か？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_011<tab>A letter from Wichard? I have not heard from him in quite some time.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_011おぉ、我が甥、ウィチャードからの手紙とは驚いた！
懐かしいな、どれどれ……。

TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_012……なるほど、アラミゴで共に暮らさないか、とな。
あいつも嬉しいことを言ってくれるではないか。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_013<tab>As touching as the sentiment is, I will not be joining him in Ala Mhigo.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_013<tab>……大変喜ばしい申し出ではあるが、断ろうと思う。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_014<tab>It has been two decades since we last called Ala Mhigo home.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_014アラミゴが帝国の支配下となってから、
あまりに長い月日が経った。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_015<tab>There are those of us who were but children when we arrived in Thanalan who now have children of their own. Children who have never set foot in Ala Mhigo.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_015ザナラーンに流れ着いたときには、
子どもだったにも関わらず、今や親となった者もいる。
故郷と言いつつ、そのアラミゴを知らない世代もいるのだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_016<tab>And the elderly among us are unable to make the trip─no matter how much they may wish to.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_016また、年老いた者のなかには、
望みつつも故郷への長旅に耐えられない者もいよう。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_017<tab>I cannot abandon these people. As leader of Little Ala Mhigo I owe it to them to stay as well.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_017それぞれの事情はどうあれ、
この地で骨を埋める覚悟を決めた者がいる以上、
リトルアラミゴの長として、彼らを見捨てることはできん。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_018<tab>That said, I am certain there are plenty among our younger residents that do wish to assist Wichard. I too believe they will be vital in rebuilding our nation.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_018……だが、若い世代の者たちには、
アラミゴでの暮らしを望むものも少なからずいるだろう。
私は、彼らこそが復興の担い手となると信じてもいる。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_019<tab>Please ask if Wichard would be willing to accept them.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_019そこで、帰還志願者たちの面倒を見てもらえないか、
「ウィチャード」に尋ねてくれないだろうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_020<tab>I know it is a long journey back to Rhalgr's Reach, but while you are traveling, I shall see to it that those who wish to leave begin their preparations.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_020手数をかけるが、お前がラールガーズリーチに赴いている間、
私は、志願者を募り、帰還への準備を進めておこう。
どうか、よろしく頼む。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_021<tab>Please ask if Wichard is willing to accept those who wish to aid his efforts to rebuild Ala Mhigo.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_021帰還志願者たちの面倒を見てもらえないか、
「ウィチャード」に尋ねてくれないだろうか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_030<tab>He said so, did he? It is a shame, but I respect his decision.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_030なるほど、そうですか……。
共に暮らせないのは残念ですが、
叔父さんの考えも、尊重したいところです。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_031<tab>As for those who wish to join me, the more the merrier! I will take any help I can get.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_031……わかりました！
アラミゴに移住を希望される方々の面倒は、
私が責任を持って、見るといたしましょう！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_032<tab>I shall begin making arrangements for their arrival this instant.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_032となると、さっそくいろいろと動かねばなりません！
受け入れ先の調整などをする必要もあるでしょうから！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_033<tab>Please tell my uncle as much. Safe journey to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_033あなたは「グンドバルド」叔父さんに、
受け入れ準備を、私が進めておくと伝えていただけますか？
よろしく頼みますね！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_034<tab>Please tell my uncle that preparations are underway. Safe journey to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_WICHARD_000_034「グンドバルド」叔父さんに、
受け入れ準備を、私が進めておくと伝えていただけますか？
よろしく頼みますね！

TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_040ふむ……私の提案を受け入れてくれたか。
それは何よりだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_041<tab>I have made a list of those that wish to make the move. Though there are still a few who are yet to make up their minds. It is not my place to hurry them into making such an important decision.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_041こちらは、帰還を望む者を集め終わったところだ。
まだ数名、アラミゴ行きを迷っている者もいるが、
急かして決めさせるのも酷というもの。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_042<tab>For the time being, I have decided to send the first group to Ala Mhigo in advance of the rest.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_042ひとまず、すでに決意を固めた者たちを、
第一陣として、アラミゴへと送り出すことにした。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_043<tab>Could I ask you to help them make the journey? Speak with me again should you be willing to help.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ991_02885_GUNDOBALD_000_043そこで相談なのだが、彼ら帰還志願者の第一陣について、
アラミゴまでの移送を、手伝ってはもらえないだろうか？
もし引き受けてくれるなら、声をかけてくれ。
